titles.title: Blessed Be The Name, Blessed Be The Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessed be the Name, Blessed be the Name. Blessed be the Name of the Lord. (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Peaceful is the Name, Peaceful is the Name. Peaceful is the Name of the Lord. (2x){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy is the Name, Holy is the Name. Holy is the Name of the Lord. (2x){/lang-eng}
